      • forallDecl

        public java.lang.String forallDecl(Module mod,
                                   java.lang.String initString,
                                   CafeEquation eq,
                                   CafeOperator action)
        Parameters:
        vars - a Vector denoting all the variables that must be quantified
        initString - a String denoting how the for all declaration must start
        mod - the module inside which we want to retrieve the variables
        action - the CafeOperator which is the main operator of the lhs of the equation
        Returns:
        a String denoting a universal quantification of variables such that they appear in the given equation lhs but NOT INSIDE of the given operator action

      • translateHiddenConstants

        public java.lang.String translateHiddenConstants(Module mod)
        Returns:
        a string denoting the declaration of all the constants denoting an Object other than the initial system states, i.e. generates the declaration of the translation of hidden constants as freshly created Java objects of the appropriate sort

      • isObjectByOpName

        public boolean isObjectByOpName(java.lang.String opName,
                                Module mod)
        Parameters:
        opName - the name of the operator
        mod - the module object this op is defined in
        Returns:
        true if the sort of the operator denotes an Object, false if it denotes a primitive Java data-type
